title: fragment:scp-es-138-3
content:
[[module css]]
#page-title {
  display: none;
}
.meta-title {
  border-bottom: solid 1px #bbbbbb;
  color: #990011;
  font-weight: normal;
  margin: 0 0 0.6em;
  padding: 0 0 0.25em;
  font-size: 200%;
}
.meta-title p {
  margin: 0;
}
.outer-chat {background: gray; padding: 1px 15px; border: solid 3px lightgray; margin: 10px; border-radius: 30px 15px}



.inner-chat {background: white; padding: 1px 15px; border: solid 3px lightgray; margin: 10px; border-radius: 30px 15px}
[[/module]]
[[div class="meta-title"]]
**SCP 재단에 어서 오세요!**
[[/div]]

> **일련번호:** SCP-XXXX-KO
> 
> **등급:** 안전/유클리드/케테르 (맞는 등급을 골라주세요.)
> 
> **특수 격리 절차:** [격리 방법을 설명하는 단락입니다.]
> 
> **설명:** [설명을 적는 단락입니다.]
> 
> **부록:** [선택적으로 추가사항을 넣는 곳입니다.]
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
[[div class="outer-chat"]]
[[div class="inner-chat"]]
[[table style="border: none; width: 100%"]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="width: 20%;"]]
[[f<image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/your-very-last-scp/skippy.png size="thumbnail"]]
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; background-color: white; color: black; padding: 1% 1% 1% 1%"]]
짜잔! 멋지지 않아?
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[/table]]

[[/div]]
[[/div]]
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
[[include :scp-wiki:component:anomaly-class-bar-source
|item-number= SCP-ES-XXX
|clearance= 1
|container-class= esoteric
|secondary-class= thaumiel
|secondary-icon=http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/component:anomaly-class-bar/thaumiel-icon.svg
|disruption-class= ekhi
|risk-class= notice
]]
@@ @@
[[div class="outer-chat"]]
[[div class="inner-chat"]]
[[table style="border: none; width: 100%"]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="width: 20%;"]]
[[f<image http://lafundacionscp.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-es-138/skippy1.png size="thumbnail"]]
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; background-color: white; color: black; padding: 1% 1% 1% 1%"]]
뭐야? 이건 우리말도 아니잖아.
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[/table]]

[[/div]]
[[/div]]
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
[[div class="outer-chat"]]
[[div class="inner-chat"]]
[[table style="border: none; width: 100%"]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="width: 20%;"]]
[[f<image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/your-very-last-scp/skippy_angry.png size="thumbnail"]]
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; background-color: white; color: black; padding: 1% 1% 1% 1%"]]
혹시... 서식을 비틀려는 건, 설마 아니겠지?
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[/table]]

[[/div]]
[[/div]]
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@

@@ @@
@@ @@

@@ @@

@@ @@
[[div class="outer-chat"]]
[[div class="inner-chat"]]
[[table style="border: none; width: 100%"]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="width: 20%;"]]
[[f<image http://lafundacionscp.wdfiles.com/local--files/your-very-last-scp/skippy_fury.gif size="thumbnail"]]
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; background-color: white; color: black; padding: 1% 1% 1% 1%"]]

[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[/table]]

[[/div]]
[[/div]]
@@ @@

> **일련번호:** SCP-XXXX-KO
> 
> **등급:** 안전/유클리드/케테르 (맞는 등급을 골라주세요.)
> 
> **특수 격리 절차:** [격리 방법을 설명하는 단락입니다.]
> 
> **설명:** [설명을 적는 단락입니다.]
> 
> **부록:** [선택적으로 추가사항을 넣는 곳입니다.]
@@ @@
[[div class="outer-chat"]]
[[div class="inner-chat"]]
[[table style="border: none; width: 100%"]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="width: 20%;"]]
[[f<image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/your-very-last-scp/skippy.png size="thumbnail"]]
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="text-align: left; background-color: white; color: black; padding: 1% 1% 1% 1%"]]
좋아! 합의할 수 있어서 기쁘네. 자, 이 서식을 어떻게 활용하는지 직접 살펴볼까?

[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[/table]]

[[/div]]
[[/div]]

> [http://scpko.wikidot.com/scp-es-138/offset/3 계속].
author: XCninety
